text: Jeremaia akar kam baregha, Nebusaradan ataghizir puvatɨ. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, Nebusaradan Jeremaia mɨgɨa ghua ghaze, “Puvatɨghtɨ, nɨ Gedalia bagh mangɨ, an Ahikamɨn otarim, egha Safanɨn igiavotarim. Babilonɨn atrivim Judan nguibabagh ativagh dar ganasa anemɨsefe. A gumazamizir maba ko kagh ikɨtɨ, nɨ a ko ikɨ. Nɨ aghuaghɨva, managh mangasa ifonge, nɨ mangɨ.” Egha Nebusaradan bizir aghuir mam ko dagher maba sara Jeremaia ganigha anetaghizɨ, a ghu.
